title: How I Learn Things Online (Way More Efficiently)——English Learning Weekly
content:
Video Link: How I Learn Things Online (Way More Efficiently)

Context

Stage one

Cast a wide net and learn as much as you can about the field that you’re geting into.

Stage two

Go strait to the top.This is a very effective method to distinguishing hight quality from low informations.

Stage three

Apply what you are learning.

Vocabulary

  • timestamps: a record in printed or digital form that shows the time at which something happened or was done
  • sift : to make a close examination of all the parts of something in order to find something or to separate what is useful from what is no

    You have to learn how to sift through the dirt to find the gold.

  • convince : v. persuade someone or make someone certain
  • discipline : n. a particular area of study, esp. the ability to control a mental activity. v. to punish someone

    The good news is that discipline is like a muscle which means it’s something that you do about it.

  • strive: to try very hard to do something or to make something happen, especially for a long time or against difficulties
  • crucial : extremely important or necessary
  • clueless adj:having no knowledge of something, or of things in general
  • incompetence : lack of ability to do something successfully or as it should be done
  • unconscious : the part of your mind that contains feelings and thoughts that you do not know about, and that influences the way you behave
  • absorption
  • disciple : a person who believes in the ideas and principles of someone famous and tries to live the way that person does or did子
  • evident : easily seen or understood
  • bombard : to attack a place with continuous shooting or bombs
  • negotiator : someone who tries to help two groups who disagree to reach an agreement with each other, usually as a job
  • legitimate ：1.reasonable and acceptable 2.allowed by law
  • portfolio ： n. a collection of drawings, designs, or other papers that represent a person’s work.
